column3:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #12153 (Avoid permanent cs_main lock in getblockheader by promag)
* #12151 (rpc: Remove cs_main lock from blockToJSON and blockheaderToJSON by promag)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the on
ACK 2feaaa0, but not worth causing a rebase for these other two tickets. This could be merged after those, or if both them are in a "needs rebase" state again.
Should just leave a comment on either of the other pull requests and close this one, imo.

Agree, I've left a [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12151/files#r200839844) on #12151.\n\nThanks for the contribution @YutakaNakasone, however this will be combined into other changes.
